p: Lippia multiflora Moldenke essential oil was extracted using hydrodistillation method with Clevenger apparatus following European Pharmacopoeia [ 50]. After two hours of extractions, EO collected from each plant was then dehydrated with Na 2SO 4 and stored at 4 Â°C until further analysis. The yield of the essential oil was calculated in % ( v/ w), based on dry plant weight.
